translation.Name: Name
translation.Select stocks to \"My list\" by clicking: Select stocks to "My list" by clicking + on details page (top right corner)
translation.No announcements in the last month: No announcements in the last month
translation.No short sellers with positions equal to: No short sellers with positions equal to or greater than 0.50%
translation.Every 15 minutes, the data in the app is: Every 15 minutes, the data in the app is updated with data from the Danish FSA's website, where information about short positions is continuously published. The timestamps for updates of short positions are based on the Danish FSA's data, not on the time when we fetched the information.
translation.According to EU regulations, a natural o: According to EU regulations, a natural or legal person who has a short position representing 0.1% or more of the issued share capital must report this to the Danish FSA. The Danish FSA aggregates these short positions for each stock and publishes them on their website. These percentage figures are the ones you see in the app.
translation.It is important to understand that, as a: It is important to understand that, as a short position only needs to be reported when it constitutes 0.1% or more of a company's issued shares, the actual short position could potentially be greater than the indicated percentage. This is because short positions below 0.1% are not included in the Danish FSA's data.
translation.EU regulations requires that a short sel: EU regulations requires that a short seller's position is disclosed when it constitutes 0.5% or more of the issued share capital. Additionally, the short seller must report any change of 0.1% or more in the short net position.
translation.When a short seller reduces their short: When a short seller reduces their short position to below 0.5%, the short seller is removed from the list of "Largest sellers" in the app.
translation.Some investors choose to take a short po: Some investors choose to take a short position as a strategic move in the market. This involves borrowing shares they do not own and selling them with the hope of buying them back later at a lower price, resulting in a profit. This practice may be motivated by an expectation that the stock's value will decline in the future, but it can also serve as a form of risk management in an investment portfolio.
translation.You can get more details by clicking on: You can get more details by clicking on a row
translation.An elegant and simplified solution for a: An elegant and simplified solution for accessing information on short positions in Danish stocks.
translation.Download the app from the App Store for: Download the app from the App Store for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch, or access the web application.
translation.Build your own watchlist by selecting sh: Build your own watchlist by selecting shorted Danish stocks that capture your interest or that you have in your portfolio.
translation.Delve into the historical data of short: Delve into the historical data of short positions for Danish stocks, presented in both tabular formats and visualized through comprehensive charts.
translation.See a list of short sellers who hold pos: See a list of short sellers who hold positions equal to or exceeding 0.50% for a given Danish stock.
translation.If you have any questions, feedback, or: If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, please email us at:
translation.The iPhone and iPad app now have push no: The iPhone and iPad app now have push notifications, so you can get notified when your watchlist is updated.
translation.Do you have any questions, feedback, or: Do you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance? We are always ready to help you. Please feel free to contact us via email, and we will do our best to respond to your inquiry as quickly as possible.
translation.Please send your inquiries to the follow: Please send your inquiries to the following email address:
translation.We use cookies to collect statistics on: We use cookies to collect statistics on the usage of the website
translation.If you click the 'Accept' button, you co: If you click the 'Accept' button, you consent to our use of cookies for statistical purposes. We use this data to improve the user experience for you and other visitors.
translation.If you click the 'Decline' button, we wi: If you click the 'Decline' button, we will not set cookies for statistical purposes. However, we will use a cookie to remember your choice and to support the functionality of the website.
translation.You can change or withdraw your consent: You can change or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the green "cookie" button in the bottom left corner.
translation.You can read more about our cookie polic: You can read more about our cookie policy in the privacy policy.
translation.We use functional cookies that are neces: We use functional cookies that are necessary to ensure our website functions properly. These cookies enable us to provide essential features, such as saving your settings and ensuring you can navigate our site without issues. Without these cookies, certain features and services on our website would not be available.
translation.We use statistical cookies to understand: We use statistical cookies to understand how our visitors use the website and to improve the user experience. We use Google Analytics to collect and analyze data on how you interact with our site. These cookies have a validity of up to 2 years. The data we collect is used solely for our own purposes and helps us improve the website for you and other visitors. Please note that we only collect statistics if you have given your consent. You can withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on the green "cookie" button in the lower left corner of the screen.
